trans-unit.source: The QContiguousCache class is a template class that provides a contiguous cache. More...

trans-unit.source: The QContiguousCache class provides an efficient way of caching items for display in a user interface view. Unlike QCache, it adds a restriction that elements within the cache are contiguous. This has the advantage of matching how user interface views most commonly request data, as a set of rows localized around the current scrolled position. This restriction allows the cache to consume less memory and processor cycles than QCache.
trans-unit.target: 所述QContiguousCache类提供了一种在用户界面视图缓存用于显示项目的有效方式。与QCache不同，它增加了一个限制，即缓存中的元素是连续的。这具有匹配用户界面如何查看最常见的请求数据的优势，这是围绕当前滚动位置定位的一组行。与QCache相比，此限制使缓存可以消耗更少的内存和处理器周期。

trans-unit.source: The daysInMonth() and daysInYear() functions return how many days there are in this date's month and year, respectively. The isLeapYear() function indicates whether a date is in a leap year. QCalendar can also supply this information, in some cases more conveniently.

trans-unit.source: The year(), month(), and day() functions provide access to the year, month, and day numbers. When more than one of these values is needed, it is more efficient to call QCalendar::partsFromDate(), to save repeating (potentially expensive) calendrical calculations.

trans-unit.source: The QDBusAbstractAdaptor class is the base class of D-Bus adaptor classes. More...

trans-unit.source: The QDBusAbstractAdaptor class is the starting point for all objects intending to provide interfaces to the external world using D-Bus. This is accomplished by attaching a one or more classes derived from QDBusAbstractAdaptor to a normal QObject and then registering that QObject with QDBusConnection::registerObject. QDBusAbstractAdaptor objects are intended to be light-weight wrappers, mostly just relaying calls into the real object (its parent) and the signals from it.
trans-unit.target: 该QDBusAbstractAdaptor类是打算提供给使用d总线外界接口的所有对象的起点。这是通过从得到的一个或多个类附着完成QDBusAbstractAdaptor到正常的QObject然后该注册的QObject与QDBusConnection :: registerObject。QDBusAbstractAdaptor对象旨在用作轻量级包装器，大多数情况下只是将调用中继到真实对象（其父对象）中，并从该对象中传递信号。

trans-unit.source: The QDBusAbstractAdaptor::setAutoRelaySignals() convenience function can also be used to make and break connections between signals in the real object and the corresponding signals in the adaptor. It will inspect the list of signals in both classes and connect those whose parameters match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 所述QDBusAbstractAdaptor :: setAutoRelaySignals（）的便利功能也可以用来建立和断开在所述真实对象信号，并在适配器中的相应信号之间的连接。它将检查两个类中的信号列表，并将参数完全匹配的那些信号连接起来。

trans-unit.source: The drives() static function provides a list of root directories for each device that contains a filing system. trans-unit.source: The QDtls class can be used to establish a secure connection with a network peer using User Datagram Protocol (UDP). DTLS connection over essentially connectionless UDP means that two peers first have to successfully complete a TLS handshake by calling doHandshake(). After the handshake has completed, encrypted datagrams can be sent to the peer using writeDatagramEncrypted(). Encrypted datagrams coming from the peer can be decrypted by decryptDatagram().
trans-unit.target: 所述QDtls类可用于建立与使用用户数据报协议（UDP）的网络对等体的安全连接。通过基本无连接的UDP进行DTLS连接意味着两个对等方首先必须通过调用doHandshake（）成功完成TLS握手。握手完成后，可以使用writeDatagramEncrypted（）将加密的数据报发送到对等方。来自对等方的已加密数据报可以由cryptoDatagram（）解密。

trans-unit.source: The QExtensionManager class provides extension management facilities for Qt Designer. When an extension is required, Qt Designer's extension manager will run through all its registered factories calling QExtensionFactory::createExtension() for each until the first one that is able to create a requested extension for the selected object, is found. This factory will then make an instance of the extension.
trans-unit.target: 该QExtensionManager类提供扩展管理设施Qt设计。当需要扩展时，Qt Designer的扩展管理器将遍历所有已注册工厂，对每个工厂调用QExtensionFactory :: createExtension（），直到找到第一个能够为所选对象创建请求的扩展的工厂。然后，该工厂将创建扩展实例。

trans-unit.source: The fileChanged() signal is emitted when a file has been modified, renamed or removed from disk. Similarly, the directoryChanged() signal is emitted when a directory or its contents is modified or removed. Note that QFileSystemWatcher stops monitoring files once they have been renamed or removed from disk, and directories once they have been removed from disk.
trans-unit.target: 所述fileChanged当文件已被修改，重命名或从磁盘中删除（）信号被发射。同样，当目录或其内容被修改或删除时，会发出directoryChanged（）信号。请注意，一旦将文件重命名或从磁盘中删除，QFileSystemWatcher就会停止监视文件；一旦从磁盘中将其删除，QFileSystemWatcher就会停止对其进行监视。

trans-unit.source: The fileChanged() signal is emitted when a file has been modified, renamed or removed from disk. trans-unit.source: The weight. Qt uses a weighting scale from 0 to 99 similar to, but not the same as, the scales used in Windows or CSS. trans-unit.source: The importGeoJson() method accepts a QJsonDocument from which it extracts a single JSON object, since the GeoJSON RFC expects that a valid GeoJSON Document has in its root a single JSON object. This method doesn't perform any validation on the input. The importer returns a QVariantList containing a single QVariantMap. This map has always at least 2 (key, value) pairs. The first one has type as key, and the corresponding value is a string identifying the GeoJSON type. This value can be one of the GeoJSON object types: Point, MultiPoint, LineString, MultiLineString, Polygon, MultiPolygon, GeometryCollection, FeatureCollection. The second pair has data as key, and the corresponding value can be either a QGeoShape or a list, depending on the GeoJSON type. The next section provides details about this node. The Feature type is converted into the type of the geometry contained within, with an additional (key, value) pair, where the key is properties and the value is a QVariantMap. Thus, a feature Map is distinguishable from the corresponding geometry, by looking for a properties member.
trans-unit.target: 所述importGeoJson（）方法接受QJsonDocument从中抽出单一的JSON对象，因为以GeoJSON RFC期望有效GeoJSON的文献在其根单个JSON对象。此方法不对输入执行任何验证。进口商返回QVariantList含有单个QVariantMap。该映射始终至少有2对（键，值）对。第一个具有 type 作为键，并且对应的值是标识GeoJSON类型的字符串。此值可以是GeoJSON对象类型之一： Point ， MultiPoint ， LineString ， MultiLineString ， Polygon ， MultiPolygon ， GeometryCollection 的， FeatureCollection 。第二对以 data 作为键，取决于GeoJSON类型，相应的值可以是QGeoShape或列表。下一节将提供有关此节点的详细信息。的 Feature 类型被转换为包含在所述几何体的类型，与另外的（键，值）对，其中键是 properties 和值是一个QVariantMap。因此，通过查找 properties 成员，可以将要素图与相应的几何区分开。

trans-unit.source: The toString outputs, for debugging purposes, the content of a QVariantList structured like importGeoJson does, to a QString using a prettyfied format.
trans-unit.target: 所述的toString输出，用于调试目的，内容QVariantList结构类似于importGeoJson确实，向的QString使用prettyfied格式。

trans-unit.source: The QGeoPositionInfoSource::setUpdateInterval() method can be used to control the rate at which position updates are received. For example, if the client application only requires updates once every 30 seconds, it can call setUpdateInterval(30000). (If no update interval is set, or setUpdateInterval() is called with a value of 0, the source uses a default interval or some other internal logic to determine when updates should be provided.)

trans-unit.source: The boundingRect() function has many different purposes. QGraphicsScene bases its item index on boundingRect(), and QGraphicsView uses it both for culling invisible items, and for determining the area that needs to be recomposed when drawing overlapping items. In addition, QGraphicsItem's collision detection mechanisms use boundingRect() to provide an efficient cut-off. The fine grained collision algorithm in collidesWithItem() is based on calling shape(), which returns an accurate outline of the item's shape as a QPainterPath.
trans-unit.target: 该boundingRect（）函数有很多不同的目的。QGraphicsScene的项目索引基于boundingRect（），而QGraphicsView则使用它来剔除不可见的项目，并确定绘制重叠项目时需要重新组合的区域。另外，QGraphicsItem的冲突检测机制使用boundingRect（）提供有效的截止。collidesWithItem（）中的细粒度碰撞算法基于调用shape（），该函数返回项目形状的准确轮廓作为QPainterPath。

trans-unit.source: The boundingRect() function has many different purposes. QGraphicsScene bases its item index on boundingRect(), and QGraphicsView uses it both for culling invisible items, and for determining the area that needs to be recomposed when drawing overlapping items. In addition, QGraphicsItem's collision detection mechanisms use boundingRect() to provide an efficient cut-off. The fine grained collision algorithm in collidesWithItem() is based on calling shape(), which returns an accurate outline of the item's shape as a QPainterPath.
trans-unit.target: 该boundingRect（）函数有很多不同的目的。QGraphicsScene的项目索引基于boundingRect（），而QGraphicsView则使用它来剔除不可见的项目，并确定绘制重叠项目时需要重新组合的区域。此外，QGraphicsItem的冲突检测机制使用boundingRect（）提供有效的截止点。collidesWithItem（）中的细粒度碰撞算法基于调用shape（），该形状返回作为QPainterPath的项目形状的准确轮廓。

trans-unit.source: The contains() function can be called to determine whether the item
trans-unit.target: 该包含（）函数可以调用，以确定是否该项目

trans-unit.source: The paint() function is called by QGraphicsView to paint the item's contents. The item has no background or default fill of its own; whatever is behind the item will shine through all areas that are not explicitly painted in this function. You can call update() to schedule a repaint, optionally passing the rectangle that needs a repaint. Depending on whether or not the item is visible in a view, the item may or may not be repainted; there is no equivalent to QWidget::repaint() in QGraphicsItem.
trans-unit.target: 该涂料（）函数的调用的QGraphicsView绘制项目的内容。该项目没有背景或没有默认填充值；该项目后面的任何内容都会在此功能中未明确绘制的所有区域中发光。您可以调用update（）安排重新绘制，可以选择传递需要重新绘制的矩形。根据该项目在视图中是否可见，该项目是否可以重新粉刷；在QGraphicsItem中没有等效于QWidget :: repaint（）的对象。

trans-unit.source: The paint() function is called by QGraphicsView to paint the item's contents. The item has no background or default fill of its own; whatever is behind the item will shine through all areas that are not explicitly painted in this function. You can call update() to schedule a repaint, optionally passing the rectangle that needs a repaint. Depending on whether or not the item is visible in a view, the item may or may not be repainted; there is no equivalent to QWidget::repaint() in QGraphicsItem.
trans-unit.target: 该涂料（）函数的调用的QGraphicsView绘制项目的内容。该项目没有背景，也没有默认填充内容。该项目后面的所有内容都会在此功能中未明确绘制的所有区域中发光。您可以调用update（）来安排重新绘制，可以选择传递需要重新绘制的矩形。根据项目是否在视图中可见，该项目可能会被重新粉刷，也可能不会被重新粉刷。在QGraphicsItem中没有等效于QWidget :: repaint（）的对象。

trans-unit.source: The QGraphicsItemAnimation class animates a QGraphicsItem. You can schedule changes to the item's transformation matrix at specified steps. The QGraphicsItemAnimation class has a current step value. When this value changes the transformations scheduled at that step are performed. The current step of the animation is set with the setStep() function.
trans-unit.target: 该QGraphicsItemAnimation类动画一个的QGraphicsItem。您可以在指定步骤安排对项目转换矩阵的更改。该QGraphicsItemAnimation类有一个当前步长值。当此值更改时，将执行在该步骤计划的转换。动画的当前步骤由 setStep() 函数设置。

trans-unit.source: The boundingRect() function of QGraphicsItemGroup returns the bounding rectangle of all items in the item group. QGraphicsItemGroup ignores the ItemIgnoresTransformations flag on its children (i.e., with respect to the geometry of the group item, the children are treated as if they were transformable).

trans-unit.source: The boundingRect() function of QGraphicsItemGroup returns the bounding rectangle of all items in the item group. trans-unit.source: The effectiveSizeHint() function, on the other hand, returns a size hint for any given Qt::SizeHint, and guarantees that the returned size is bound to the minimum and maximum sizes and size hints. You can set the item's vertical and horizontal size policy by calling setSizePolicy(). The sizePolicy property is used by the layout system to describe how this item prefers to grow or shrink.

trans-unit.source: The sizeHint() function returns the item' minimum, preferred and maximum size hints. You can override these properties by calling setMinimumSize(), setPreferredSize() or setMaximumSize(). You can also use functions such as setMinimumWidth() or setMaximumHeight() to set only the width or height component if desired.

trans-unit.source: The QApplication::lastWindowClosed() signal is emitted when the last visible primary window (i.e. window with no parent) with the Qt::WA_QuitOnClose attribute set is closed. By default this attribute is set for all widgets except transient windows such as splash screens, tool windows, and popup menus.

trans-unit.source: The qHash() function computes a numeric value based on a key. It can use any algorithm imaginable, as long as it always returns the same value if given the same argument. In other words, if e1 == e2, then qHash(e1) == qHash(e2) must hold as well. However, to obtain good performance, the qHash() function should attempt to return different hash values for different keys to the largest extent possible.
trans-unit.target: 该qHash（）函数计算基于密钥的数值。只要给出相同的参数，它总是返回相同的值，它就可以使用任何可以想象的算法。换句话说，如果 e1 == e2 ，则 qHash(e1) == qHash(e2) 必须成立。但是，为了获得良好的性能，qHash（）函数应尝试最大程度地为不同的键返回不同的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: The QHttpMultiPart resembles a MIME multipart message, as described in RFC 2046, which is to be sent over HTTP. A multipart message consists of an arbitrary number of body parts (see QHttpPart), which are separated by a unique boundary. The boundary of the QHttpMultiPart is constructed with the string "boundary_.oOo._" followed by random characters, and provides enough uniqueness to make sure it does not occur inside the parts itself. If desired, the boundary can still be set via setBoundary().
trans-unit.target: QHttpMultiPart类似于RFC 2046中描述的MIME多部分消息，该消息将通过HTTP发送。多部分消息由任意数量的正文部分（请参阅QHttpPart）组成，这些正文部分由唯一的边界分隔。QHttpMultiPart的边界是由字符串“ boundary_.oOo._”和后跟随机字符构成的，并提供了足够的唯一性以确保它不会在部件内部发生。如果需要，仍可以通过setBoundary（）设置边界。

trans-unit.source: The QHttpPart class holds a body part to be used inside a HTTP multipart MIME message (which is represented by the QHttpMultiPart class). trans-unit.source: The QImage class provides a hardware-independent image representation that allows direct access to the pixel data, and can be used as a paint device. More...

trans-unit.source: The QImage class provides a hardware-independent image representation which is designed and optimized for I/O, and for direct pixel access and manipulation. QImage supports several image formats including monochrome, 8-bit, 32-bit and alpha-blended images.
trans-unit.target: 所述QImage的类提供，其被设计和用于I / O进行了优化，并用于直接像素访问和操作独立于硬件的图像表示。QImage支持多种图像格式，包括单色，8位，32位和alpha混合图像。

trans-unit.source: The QImage class supports several image formats described by the Format enum. These include monochrome, 8-bit, 32-bit and alpha-blended images which are available in all versions of Qt 4.x.
trans-unit.target: 所述QImage的类支持所描述的几种图像格式格式枚举。这些包括单色，8位，32位和alpha混合图像，可在所有Qt 4.x版本中使用。

trans-unit.source: The cacheKey() function returns a number that uniquely identifies the contents of this QImage object.

trans-unit.source: The cacheKey() function returns a number that uniquely identifies the contents of this QImage object.

trans-unit.source: The depth() function returns the depth of the image. The supported depths are 1 (monochrome), 8, 16, 24 and 32 bits. The bitPlaneCount() function tells how many of those bits that are used. For more information see the Image Formats section.
trans-unit.target: 的深度（）函数返回的图像的深度。支持的深度为1（单色），8、16、24和32位。该bitPlaneCount（）函数告知有多少被用于那些位。有关更多信息，请参见“ 图像格式”部分。

trans-unit.source: The format(), bytesPerLine(), and sizeInBytes() functions provide low-level information about the data stored in the image.
trans-unit.target: 的格式（），bytesPerLine（），和sizeInBytes（）函数提供关于存储在图像数据的低级别信息。

trans-unit.source: The hasAlphaChannel() function tells if the image's format respects the alpha channel, or not. The allGray() and isGrayscale() functions tell whether an image's colors are all shades of gray.
trans-unit.target: 所述hasAlphaChannel（）函数告诉如果图像的格式尊重alpha通道，或没有。该allGray（）和isGrayscale（）函数告诉图像的颜色是否为灰色。

trans-unit.source: The mirrored() function returns a mirror of the image in the desired direction, the scaled() returns a copy of the image scaled to a rectangle of the desired measures, and the rgbSwapped() function constructs a BGR image from a RGB image.
trans-unit.target: 的镜像（）函数返回的图像中所期望的方向的反射镜，所述缩放的（）返回缩放到所希望的措施的矩形的图像的副本，并且rgbSwapped（）函数从RGB图像构造一个BGR图像。

trans-unit.source: The rect() function returns the image's enclosing rectangle. The valid() function tells if a given pair of coordinates is within this rectangle. The offset() function returns the number of pixels by which the image is intended to be offset by when positioned relative to other images, which also can be manipulated using the setOffset() function.
trans-unit.target: 的矩形（）函数返回图像的包围矩形。的有效（）函数告诉如果给定的坐标对是这样的矩形内。的偏移（）函数返回由该图像意像素的数量由当相对于其他图像，也可以使用被操纵定位被偏移setOffset（）函数。

trans-unit.source: The scaledToWidth() and scaledToHeight() functions return scaled copies of the image.
trans-unit.target: 所述scaledToWidth（）和scaledToHeight（）函数返回缩放的图像的副本。

trans-unit.source: The size(), width(), height(), dotsPerMeterX(), and dotsPerMeterY() functions provide information about the image size and aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 的大小（），宽度（），高度（），dotsPerMeterX（），和dotsPerMeterY（）函数提供关于图像尺寸和宽高比信息。

trans-unit.source: The text() function returns the image text associated with the given text key. An image's text keys can be retrieved using the textKeys() function. Use the setText() function to alter an image's text.
trans-unit.target: 该文本（）函数返回给定文本键关联的图像文本。可以使用textKeys（）函数检索图像的文本键。使用setText（）函数更改图像的文本。

trans-unit.source: The transformed() function returns a copy of the image that is transformed with the given transformation matrix and transformation mode: Internally, the transformation matrix is adjusted to compensate for unwanted translation, i.e. transformed() returns the smallest image containing all transformed points of the original image. The static trueMatrix() function returns the actual matrix used for transforming the image.
trans-unit.target: 的转化（）函数返回被变换与给定的变换矩阵和变换模式下的图像的副本：在内部，所述变换矩阵进行调节，以补偿不希望的翻译，即转化的（）返回包含的所有变换的点的最小图像原始图像。静态trueMatrix（）函数返回用于转换图像的实际矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The readyRead() signal is emitted every time a new chunk of data has arrived. bytesAvailable() then returns the number of bytes that are available for reading. Typically, you would connect the readyRead() signal to a slot and read all available data there. If you don't read all the data at once, the remaining data will still be available later, and any new incoming data will be appended to QAbstractSocket's internal read buffer. To limit the size of the read buffer, call setReadBufferSize().
trans-unit.target: 所述readyRead（）信号被发射每一个数据的新块已到达的时间。然后，bytesAvailable（）返回可读取的字节数。通常，您可以将readyRead（）信号连接到插槽并在其中读取所有可用数据。如果您不一次读取所有数据，则其余数据以后仍将可用，并且任何新的传入数据都将附加到QAbstractSocket的内部读取缓冲区中。要限制读取缓冲区的大小，请调用setReadBufferSize（）。

It also emits aboutToActivate() before it is activated.

trans-unit.source: The QMediaObject class provides a common base for multimedia objects. More...

trans-unit.source: The QMediaPlayer class allows the playing of a media source. More...

trans-unit.source: The QMediaPlayer class is a high level media playback class. It can be used to playback such content as songs, movies and internet radio. The content to playback is specified as a QMediaContent object, which can be thought of as a main or canonical URL with additional information attached. When provided with a QMediaContent playback may be able to commence.
trans-unit.target: 该QMediaPlayer类是高水平的媒体播放类。它可以用来播放诸如歌曲，电影和互联网广播之类的内容。要播放的内容指定为QMediaContent对象，可以将其视为附加了附加信息的主URL或规范URL。提供QMediaContent时，可能会开始播放。

trans-unit.source: The QMediaPlayerControl class provides access to the media playing functionality of a QMediaService. More...
trans-unit.target: QMediaPlayerControl类提供对QMediaService的媒体播放功能的访问。更多...

trans-unit.source: The QMediaPlaylist class provides a list of media content to play. More...
trans-unit.target: 该QMediaPlaylist类提供的媒体内容要播放列表。更多...

trans-unit.source: The QMediaRecorder class is a high level media recording class. It's not intended to be used alone but for accessing the media recording functions of other media objects, like QRadioTuner, or QCamera.
trans-unit.target: 该QMediaRecorder类是高水平的媒体记录类。它不打算单独使用，而是用于访问其他媒体对象的媒体录制功能，例如QRadioTuner或QCamera。

trans-unit.source: The QMediaRecorder class is used for the recording of media content. More...

trans-unit.source: The QMediaTimeInterval class represents a time interval with integer precision. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述QMediaTimeInterval类表示具有整数精度的时间间隔。更多...

trans-unit.source: The contains() method determines if a specified time lies within the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 所述包含（）方法确定的时间间隔内的指定时间的所在。

trans-unit.source: The isNormal() method determines if a time interval is normal (a normal time interval has start() <= end()). A normal interval can be received from an abnormal interval by calling the normalized() method.
trans-unit.target: 所述isNormal（）方法确定是否时间间隔是正常的（正常的时间间隔具有启动（）<= 结束（））。通过调用normalized（）方法，可以从异常间隔中接收正常间隔。

trans-unit.source: The translated() method returns a time interval which has been translated forwards or backwards through time by a specified offset.
trans-unit.target: 的翻译（）方法返回已由一个指定的偏移向前或向后平移通过时间的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The QMediaTimeRange class represents a set of zero or more disjoint time intervals. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述QMediaTimeRange类表示一组零个或多个不相交的时间间隔。更多...

trans-unit.source: The addInterval(), removeInterval() and clear() methods are used to modify the current time range.
trans-unit.target: 所述addInterval（），removeInterval（）和清晰（）方法用于修改当前时间范围。

trans-unit.source: The earliestTime(), latestTime(), intervals() and isEmpty() methods are used to get information about the current time range.
trans-unit.target: 的最早的时候（），latestTime（），间隔（）和的isEmpty（）方法用于获取有关当前时间范围的信息。

trans-unit.source: The detailed text property is always interpreted as plain text. The main text and informative text properties can be either plain text or rich text. These strings are interpreted according to the setting of the text format property. The default setting is auto-text.

trans-unit.target: 所述Q_DECLARE_METATYPE（）宏也使得有可能对于要用作参数信号这些值，但是

trans-unit.source: The Q_DECLARE_METATYPE() macro and qRegisterMetaType() function documentation contain more detailed information about their uses and limitations.

trans-unit.source: The QMimeData class is used to represent data that is transferred to and from the clipboard. To put data on the clipboard, you can use the setText(), setImage(), and setPixmap() convenience functions for common data types. These functions are similar to those found in the QMimeData class, except that they also take an additional argument that controls where the data is stored: If Clipboard is specified, the data is placed on the clipboard; if Selection is specified, the data is placed in the mouse selection (on X11 only). By default, data is put on the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 所述QMimeData类用于表示被转移到和从剪贴板数据。要将数据放在剪贴板上，可以将setText（），setImage（）和setPixmap（）便捷函数用于常见数据类型。这些函数与QMimeData类中的函数相似，不同之处在于它们还使用一个附加参数来控制数据的存储位置：如果指定了Clipboard，则将数据放置在剪贴板上；如果指定了Selection，则将数据放置在鼠标选择中（仅在X11上）。默认情况下，数据放置在剪贴板上。

trans-unit.source: The QMimeData class provides a container for data that records information about its MIME type. More...
trans-unit.target: 该QMimeData类提供了数据记录有关的MIME类型信息的容器。更多...

trans-unit.source: The coordinate is a basic unit of geographical information. The coordinate type has attributes to hold the latitude, longitude and altitude.
trans-unit.target: 的坐标是地理信息的基本单元。该坐标类型有属性来保持 latitude ， longitude 和 altitude 。

trans-unit.source: The contains() method can be used to test if a coordinate is within the geoshape.
trans-unit.target: 所述包含（）方法可用于测试一个坐标是geoshape内。

trans-unit.source: The isEmpty attribute can be used to test if the geoshape represents a region with a geometrical area of 0.
trans-unit.target: 所述的isEmpty如果geoshape表示为0的几何面积的区域属性可用于测试。

trans-unit.source: The isValid attribute can be used to test if a coordinate is valid. A coordinate is considered valid if it has a valid latitude and longitude. A valid altitude is not required. The latitude must be between -90 and 90 inclusive and the longitude must be between -180 and 180 inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 所述的isValid属性可以被用来测试一个坐标是有效的。如果坐标具有有效的纬度和经度，则认为该坐标有效。不需要有效的高度。纬度必须在-90至90（含）之间，经度必须在-180至180（含）之间。

trans-unit.source: The isValid attribute can be used to test if the geoshape represents a valid geographic area.
trans-unit.target: 所述的isValid如果geoshape代表有效的地理区域属性可用于测试。

trans-unit.source: The SoundEffect is trying to load the source.
trans-unit.target: 在SoundEffect中试图加载源。

trans-unit.source: The MapObjectView type only makes sense when contained in a Map, meaning that it will not work when added inside other QML elements. This can also be intended as an object layer on top of a Map.

trans-unit.target: 所述StandardPaths单类型提供了一种用于查询标准系统路径的方法。标准路径在结合FileDialog和FolderDialog类型时最有用。

trans-unit.source: The DelegateChoice type wraps a delegate and defines the circumstances in which it should be chosen.
trans-unit.target: 所述DelegateChoice型包装的委托，并限定在其中应选择的情形。

trans-unit.source: The DelegateChooser is a special Component type intended for those scenarios where a Component is required by a view and used as a delegate. DelegateChooser encapsulates a set of DelegateChoices. These choices are used to determine the delegate that will be instantiated for each item in the model. The selection of the choice is performed based on the value that a model item has for role, and also based on index.
trans-unit.target: 所述DelegateChooser是一种特殊的组件类型旨在用于其中通过的视图所需要的组件，并用作代表这些情况。DelegateChooser封装了一组DelegateChoice。这些选择用于确定将为模型中的每个项目实例化的委托。根据模型项对角色具有的值以及索引来执行选择的选择。

trans-unit.source: The WavefrontMesh provides a mesh based on a Wavefront .obj file. More...

trans-unit.source: The NodeInstantiator element will manage the objects it creates. Those objects are parented to the Instantiator and can also be deleted by the NodeInstantiator if the NodeInstantiator's properties change. Nodes can also be destroyed dynamically through other means, and the NodeInstantiator will not recreate them unless the properties of the NodeInstantiator change.
trans-unit.target: 该NodeInstantiator元素将管理它创建的对象。这些对象是实例化器的父对象，如果NodeInstantiator的属性发生更改，也可以由NodeInstantiator删除。还可以通过其他方式动态销毁节点，除非NodeInstantiator的属性发生更改，否则NodeInstantiator不会重新创建它们。

trans-unit.source: The ConeGeometry type is most commonly used internally by the ConeMesh type but can also be used in custom GeometryRenderer types. The ConeGeometry type allows for creation of both a cone and a truncated cone.
trans-unit.target: 该ConeGeometry类型是最常见的由内部使用ConeMesh类型，但也可以在自定义使用GeometryRenderer类型。该ConeGeometry类型允许创建两个锥体和截锥体。

trans-unit.target: 该DiffuseSpecularMaterial类提供的Phong光照效果的默认实现。更多...

trans-unit.target: 该FirstPersonCameraController允许控制从第一人称视角的场景摄像机。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ForwardRenderer provides a default FrameGraph implementation of a forward renderer. More...
trans-unit.target: 该ForwardRenderer提供了默认的FrameGraph向前渲染的执行。更多...

trans-unit.source: The GoochMaterial provides a material that implements the Gooch shading model, popular in CAD and CAM applications. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述GoochMaterial提供了一种材料，其实现了古氏着色模型，在CAD和CAM应用流行。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MetalRoughMaterial in Qt 3D Extras is currently the only provided material that makes use of camera exposure. Negative values will cause the material to be darker, and positive values will cause it to be lighter.
trans-unit.target: Qt 3D Extras中的MetalRoughMaterial是目前唯一提供的利用相机曝光的材料。负值将使材质变暗，正值将使材质变亮。

trans-unit.source: The NormalDiffuseMapAlphaMaterial provides a specialization of NormalDiffuseMapMaterial with alpha coverage and a depth test performed in the rendering pass. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述NormalDiffuseMapAlphaMaterial提供的特NormalDiffuseMapMaterial具有α覆盖和在渲染通道进行深度测试。更多...

trans-unit.source: The NormalDiffuseMapMaterial provides a default implementation of the phong lighting and bump effect where the diffuse light component is read from a texture map and the normals of the mesh being rendered from a normal texture map. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述NormalDiffuseMapMaterial提供Phong光照的默认实现和凸块，其中的漫射光成分从纹理贴图和网状物的法线读取从正常纹理映射所呈现的效果。更多...

trans-unit.source: The NormalDiffuseSpecularMapMaterial provides a default implementation of the phong lighting and bump effect where the diffuse and specular light components are read from texture maps and the normals of the mesh being rendered from a normal texture map. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述NormalDiffuseSpecularMapMaterial提供Phong光照的默认实现，并且其中所述漫射和镜面光分量从纹理贴图读取和网状物的法线从正常纹理贴图被呈现凹凸的效果。更多...

trans-unit.source: The OrbitCameraController class allows controlling the scene camera along orbital path.
trans-unit.target: 该OrbitCameraController类允许控制沿轨道路径的场景摄像机。

trans-unit.target: 该OrbitCameraController类允许控制沿轨道路径的场景摄像机。更多...

trans-unit.source: The PlaneGeometry type is most commonly used internally by the PlaneMesh type but can also be used in custom GeometryRenderer types.
trans-unit.target: 该PlaneGeometry类型是最常见的由内部使用PlaneMesh类型，但也可以在自定义使用GeometryRenderer类型。

trans-unit.source: The SphereGeometry type is most commonly used internally by the SphereMesh type but can also be used in custom GeometryRenderer types.
trans-unit.target: 该SphereGeometry类型是最常见的由内部使用SphereMesh类型，但也可以在自定义使用GeometryRenderer类型。

trans-unit.source: The Text2DEntity renders text as triangles in the XY plane. The geometry will be fitted in the rectangle of specified width and height. If the resulting geometry is wider than the specified width, the remainder will be rendered on the new line.
trans-unit.target: 该Text2DEntity呈现文本在XY平面三角形。几何将适合指定宽度和高度的矩形。如果生成的几何图形比指定的宽度宽，则其余部分将在新行上呈现。

trans-unit.source: The TorusGeometry type is most commonly used internally by the TorusMesh type but can also be used in custom GeometryRenderer types.
trans-unit.target: 该TorusGeometry类型是最常见的由内部使用TorusMesh类型，但也可以在自定义使用GeometryRenderer类型。

trans-unit.source: The InputSettings component must be set as a component of the scene root entity. It stores a pointer to the object that acts as the source of input events to be handled by various input classes. For example, a Window instance can be an event source.
trans-unit.target: 所述InputSettings部件必须被设置为场景根实体的部件。它存储指向该对象的指针，该对象充当各种输入类要处理的输入事件的源。例如，Window实例可以是事件源。

trans-unit.source: The KeyEvent QML type cannot be directly created. Objects of this type are used as signal parameters in KeyboardHandler.
trans-unit.target: 该KeyEvent的 QML类型不能直接创建。此类型的对象在KeyboardHandler中用作信号参数。

trans-unit.source: The FrameAction provides a way to perform tasks each frame in a synchronized way with the Qt3D backend. This is useful to implement some aspects of application logic and to prototype functionality that can later be folded into an additional Qt3D aspect.
trans-unit.target: 所述FrameAction提供与Qt3D后端以同步的方式执行任务的每帧的方式。这对于实现应用程序逻辑的某些方面以及以后可以折叠为其他Qt3D方面的原型功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: The AlphaTest class specify alpha reference test. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述AlphaTest类指定alpha参考测试。更多...

trans-unit.source: The CullFace type specifies whether front or back face culling is enabled. More...
trans-unit.target: 该CullFace类型指定是正面还是背面剔除已启用。更多...

trans-unit.target: 所述DepthTest类型测试对样品的深度片段着色器的深度值被写入。更多...

trans-unit.source: The FrontFace type defines front and back facing polygons. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述FrontFace类型定义正面和背面的多边形。更多...

trans-unit.source: The LayerFilter can be configured to select or discard entities with a specific Layer depending on the filterMode property. By default, entities referencing one of the Layer objects that are also being referenced by the LayerFilter are selected (AcceptAnyMatchingLayers).
trans-unit.target: 的LayerFilter可以被配置为选择，或与特定的丢弃实体层取决于FILTERMODE属性。默认情况下，选择引用也由LayerFilter引用的Layer对象之一的实体（AcceptAnyMatchingLayers）。

trans-unit.source: The LevelOfDetail component is not shareable between multiple entities.
trans-unit.target: 该LevelOfDetail组件不是多间共享的实体。

trans-unit.source: The LevelOfDetail component is not shareable between multiple Entity's.
trans-unit.target: 该LevelOfDetail组件之间并不多实体的共享。

trans-unit.target: 所述LevelOfDetailBoundingSphere QML类型提供了一种简单的球形体积，由它的中心和半径限定。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ObjectPicker class instantiates a component that can be used to interact with an Entity by a process known as picking. More...

trans-unit.source: The RenderSettings component must be set as a component of the scene root entity. It specifies render policy and picking settings, as well as hosts the active FrameGraph.
trans-unit.target: 所述RenderSettings部件必须被设置为场景根实体的部件。它指定渲染策略和选择设置，并托管活动的FrameGraph。

trans-unit.source: The RenderSettings type holds settings related to rendering process and host the active FrameGraph. More...
trans-unit.target: 该RenderSettings类型存储有关渲染过程设置和举办活动FrameGraph。更多...

trans-unit.source: The RenderStateSetFrameGraph node offers a way of specifying a set of RenderState objects to be applied during the execution of a framegraph branch. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述RenderStateSet FrameGraph节点提供指定一组的方式绘制状态一个framegraph分支的执行期间要应用对象。更多...

trans-unit.source: The RenderSurfaceSelector can be used to select the surface, where Qt3D renders the content. The surface can either be window surface or offscreen surface. The externalRenderTargetSize is used to specify the actual size of the render target when offscreen surface is used.
trans-unit.target: 的RenderSurfaceSelector可用于选择的表面上，其中Qt3D呈现的内容。该表面可以是窗口表面或屏幕外表面。当使用屏幕外表面时，externalRenderTargetSize用于指定渲染目标的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: The RenderTarget class encapsulates a target (usually a frame buffer object) which the renderer can render into. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述的RenderTarget类封装目标（通常是缓冲对象帧），该渲染器可以渲染成。更多...

trans-unit.source: The RenderTargetOutput type allows the specification of an attachment of a render target (whether it is a color texture, a depth texture, etc... ). More...
trans-unit.target: 所述RenderTargetOutput类型允许渲染目标的附接的规范（不论它是一个颜色纹理，深度纹理，等等...）。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ScissorTest type discards fragments that fall outside of a certain rectangular portion of the screen. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述ScissorTest落在外面的屏幕的特定矩形部分的类型丢弃片段。更多...

trans-unit.source: The StencilMask type controls the front and back writing of individual bits in the stencil planes. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述StencilMask型对照在模板平面各个位的正面和背面书写。更多...

trans-unit.target: 所述StencilOperation类型指定模版操作。更多...

trans-unit.target: 该StencilOperationArguments类型指定为模板操作的参数。

trans-unit.target: 该StencilTest类型指定参数为stecil测试。更多...

trans-unit.target: 该StencilTestArguments类型指定的参数为模板测试。

trans-unit.source: The SoundInstance is not playing, and when playback begins next it will play from position zero.
trans-unit.target: 该SoundInstance不打，而当开始播放下一它将从零位打。

trans-unit.source: The SoundInstance is not playing, and when playback begins next it will play from the position that it was paused at.
trans-unit.target: 该SoundInstance不打，而当开始播放下一它将从它被暂停的位置播放。

trans-unit.target: 该SoundInstance正在播放的媒体。

trans-unit.source: The BluetoothService object describing the discovered service.
trans-unit.target: 描述发现的服务的BluetoothService对象。

trans-unit.source: The BarCategoryAxis class is used to add the categories to the chart's axis. Category labels have to be unique. If the same category label is defined for several box-and-whiskers items, only the first one is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 所述BarCategoryAxis类用于类别添加到图表的轴。类别标签必须是唯一的。如果为几个盒须项目定义了相同的类别标签，则仅绘制第一个。

trans-unit.source: The BarCategoryAxis type can be set up to show an axis line with tick marks, grid lines, and shades. Categories are drawn between the ticks. It can be used also with a line series.
trans-unit.target: 所述BarCategoryAxis类型可以设置为显示与刻度线，网格线和色调的轴线。在刻度之间绘制类别。它也可以与线系列一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The CandlestickSeries based object that is used by the mapper.
trans-unit.target: 该CandlestickSeries这所使用由映射器基于对象。

trans-unit.source: The CandlestickSeries type acts as a container for single candlestick items. Each item is drawn to its own category when using BarCategoryAxis. DateTimeAxis and ValueAxis can be used as an alternative to BarCategoryAxis. In this case, each candlestick item is drawn according to its timestamp value.
trans-unit.target: 所述CandlestickSeries这类型充当单个烛台项的容器。使用BarCategoryAxis时，每个项目都绘制到其自己的类别。DateTimeAxis和ValueAxis可以用作BarCategoryAxis的替代方法。在这种情况下，每个烛台项目均根据其时间戳值绘制。

trans-unit.source: The CategoryRange type is used together with the CategoryAxis type to specify labeled ranges on category axes. The widths of the category ranges can be specified freely.
trans-unit.target: 所述CategoryRange类型与一起使用的CategoryAxis类型来指定类别轴标记范围。类别范围的宽度可以自由指定。

trans-unit.source: The ChartView type displays different series types as charts.
trans-unit.target: 所述ChartView型显示器不同系列类型作为图表。

trans-unit.source: The DateTimeAxis type can be set up to show an axis line with tick marks, grid lines, and shades. The axis labels display dates and times and can be configured by setting an appropriate DateTime format.
trans-unit.target: 所述的DateTimeAxis类型可以设置为显示与刻度线，网格线和色调的轴线。轴标签显示日期和时间，可以通过设置适当的DateTime格式进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The HBarModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and AbstractBarSeries, so that each row in the data model defines a bar set and each column maps to a category in a bar series. You need to implement the data model and expose it to QML.
trans-unit.target: 所述HBarModelMapper类型使得能够使用从所导出的数据模型化QAbstractItemModel类作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在数据模型和AbstractBarSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一行都定义一个条形集，并且每一列都映射到一条条形图中的类别。您需要实现数据模型并将其公开给QML。

trans-unit.source: The HBoxPlotModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A horizontal model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and a BoxPlotSeries type, so that each row in the data model defines a box-and-whiskers item and each column maps to the range and three median values of the box-and-whiskers item.
trans-unit.target: 所述HBoxPlotModelMapper类型使得能够使用从所导出的数据模型化QAbstractItemModel类作为图表的数据源。水平模型映射器用于在数据模型和BoxPlotSeries类型之间建立连接，以便数据模型中的每一行都定义一个盒须项目，并且每一列都映射到该盒的范围和三个中间值，和胡须项目。

trans-unit.source: The PieSeries object that is used by the mapper. If you define the mapper element as a child for a PieSeries, leave this property undefined. All the data in the series is discarded when it is set to the mapper. When a new series is specified, the old series is disconnected (but it preserves its data).
trans-unit.target: 映射器使用的PieSeries对象。如果将mapper元素定义为PieSeries的子元素，请保留此属性的不确定性。将系列中的所有数据设置为映射器后，这些数据将被丢弃。指定新系列后，旧系列将断开连接（但会保留其数据）。

trans-unit.source: The PieSlice type should be used as a child of a PieSeries type. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该PieSlice类型应作为一个的孩子PieSeries将类型。例如：

trans-unit.source: The ScatterSeries type presents data in scatter charts. More...
trans-unit.target: 该ScatterSeries键入散点图所提供的数据。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ValueAxis type can be set up to show an axis line with tick marks, grid lines, and shades. The values on the axis are drawn at the positions of tick marks.
trans-unit.target: 所述ValueAxis类型可以设置为显示与刻度线，网格线和色调的轴线。轴上的值绘制在刻度线的位置。

trans-unit.source: The VBarModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A vertical model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and QAbstractBarSeries, so that each column in the data model defines a bar set and each row maps to a category in a bar series. You need to implement the data model and expose it to QML.
trans-unit.target: 所述VBarModelMapper类型使得能够使用从所导出的数据模型化QAbstractItemModel类作为图表的数据源。垂直模型映射器用于在数据模型和QAbstractBarSeries之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一列都定义一个条形集，并且每一行都映射到一条条形图中的类别。您需要实现数据模型并将其公开给QML。

trans-unit.source: The VBoxPlotModelMapper type enables using a data model derived from the QAbstractItemModel class as a data source for a chart. A vertical model mapper is used to create a connection between a data model and a BoxPlotSeries type, so that each column in the data model defines a box-and-whiskers item and each row maps to the range and three median values of the box-and-whiskers item.
trans-unit.target: 所述VBoxPlotModelMapper类型使得能够使用从所导出的数据模型化QAbstractItemModel类作为图表的数据源。垂直模型映射器用于在数据模型和BoxPlotSeries类型之间创建连接，以便数据模型中的每一列都定义一个盒须项目，并且每一行都映射到该盒的范围和三个中值。和胡须项目。

trans-unit.source: The XYPoint type is a convenience type for initializing line, spline, and scatter series with static coordinate data. To manipulate a series dynamically, use the data manipulation functions it inherits from the XYSeries type, instead.
trans-unit.target: 所述的Xypoint类型是用于初始化线，样条，和散射系列静态坐标数据的便利类型。要动态地处理序列，请改用它从XYSeries类型继承的数据处理函数。

trans-unit.source: The Scene3D pointer that can be used to manipulate the scene and access the scene elements, such as the active camera.
trans-unit.target: 该Scene3D可用于指针操纵场景并访问场景元素，如活性相机。

trans-unit.source: The horizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties define the offset in pixels for the center point of the gradient compared to the item center.
trans-unit.target: 的horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性定义为相比于项目中心的梯度的中心点的像素的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The DropShadow effect blurs the alpha channel of the input, colorizes the result and places it behind the source object to create a soft shadow. The shadow's color can be changed using the color property. The location of the shadow can be changed with the horizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties.
trans-unit.target: 的阴影效果效应模糊了输入的alpha通道，colorizes结果，并把它的源对象以产生软阴影后面。可以使用color属性更改阴影的颜色。可以使用horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性更改阴影的位置。

trans-unit.source: The horizontalOffset and verticalOffset properties define the offset in pixels for the center point of the gradient compared to the item center.
trans-unit.target: 的horizo​​ntalOffset和verticalOffset属性定义为相比于项目中心的梯度的中心点的像素的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The horizontalRadius and verticalRadius properties define the shape and size of the radial gradient. If the radiuses are equal, the shape of the gradient is a circle. If the horizontal and vertical radiuses differ, the shape is elliptical. The radiuses are given in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 的horizo​​ntalRadius和verticalRadius属性定义了径向渐变的形状和尺寸。如果半径相等，则渐变的形状为圆形。如果水平和垂直半径不同，则形状为椭圆形。半径以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The RecursiveBlur effect softens the image by blurring it with an algorithm that uses a recursive feedback loop to blur the source multiple times. The effect may give more blurry results than GaussianBlur or FastBlur, but the result is produced asynchronously and takes more time.
trans-unit.target: 所述RecursiveBlur效果通过与使用递归反馈回路来多次模糊源的算法模糊它软化的图像。与GaussianBlur或FastBlur相比，该效果可能会产生更多的模糊结果，但是结果是异步产生的，并且需要更多时间。

trans-unit.source: The CameraCapabilities type holds information about the camera capabilities for a specific map type. More...
trans-unit.target: 该CameraCapabilities类型包含有关特定地图类型的相机功能的信息。更多...

trans-unit.source: The CategoryModel type provides a model of the categories that are available from the current Plugin. The model supports both a flat list of categories and a hierarchical tree representing category groupings. This can be controlled by the hierarchical property.
trans-unit.target: 所述CategoryModel类型提供了可从当前的类别的模型插件。该模型支持类别的平面列表和代表类别分组的层次树。这可以由分层属性控制。

trans-unit.source: The ContactDetail provides a single detail on how one could contact a Place. The ContactDetail consists of a label, which is a localized string describing the contact method, and a value representing the actual contact detail.
trans-unit.target: 该ContactDetail提供了一个如何能联系详单地点。所述ContactDetail由一个的标签，这是描述的接触方法的本地化字符串，和一个值表示实际联系人细节。

trans-unit.source: The ContactDetail type holds a contact detail such as a phone number or a website address. More...

trans-unit.source: The ContactDetails type holds contact details for a Place. More...
trans-unit.target: 该ContactDetails类型包含联系信息的地方。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ContactDetails type is a map of ContactDetail objects. To access contact details in the map use the keys() method to get the list of keys stored in the map and then use the [] operator to access the ContactDetail items.
trans-unit.target: 所述ContactDetails类型是地图上ContactDetail对象。要访问地图中的联系人详细信息，请使用keys（）方法获取存储在地图中的键的列表，然后使用 [] 运算符访问ContactDetail项目。

trans-unit.source: The DynamicParameter type represents a parameter for a Map element. This type provides a mean to specify plugin-dependent optional parameters for a map. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述DynamicParameter类型表示用于地图元件的参数。此类型提供了一种手段，可以为地图指定依赖于插件的可选参数。更多...

trans-unit.source: The EditorialModel is a read-only model used to fetch editorials related to a Place. Binding a Place via EditorialModel::place initiates an initial fetch of editorials. The model performs fetches incrementally and is intended to be used in conjunction with a View such as a ListView. When the View reaches the last of the editorials currently in the model, a fetch is performed to retrieve more if they are available. The View is automatically updated as the editorials are received. The number of editorials which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of editorials available can be accessed via the totalCount property.
trans-unit.target: 该EditorialModel是用来取得相关的社论只读模式广场。通过EditorialModel :: place绑定场所将启动对社论的初始获取。该模型以增量方式执行访存，旨在与诸如ListView的View结合使用。当“视图”到达模型中当前的最后社论时，将进行提取以检索更多（如果可用）。当收到社论时，视图将自动更新。一次获取的社论数由batchSize属性指定。可以通过totalCount属性访问可用的社论总数。

trans-unit.source: The EditorialModel type provides a model of place editorials. More...
trans-unit.target: 该EditorialModel类型提供地方社论的典范。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ExtendedAttributes type holds additional data about a Place. More...
trans-unit.target: 该ExtendedAttributes类型保存有关附加数据放置。更多...

trans-unit.source: The ExtendedAttributes type is a map of PlaceAttributes. To access attributes in the map use the keys() method to get the list of keys stored in the map and use the [] operator to access the PlaceAttribute items.
trans-unit.target: 所述ExtendedAttributes类型是地图上PlaceAttributes。要访问地图中的属性，请使用keys（）方法获取存储在地图中的键的列表，并使用 [] 运算符访问PlaceAttribute项。

trans-unit.source: The GeocodeModel type is used as part of a model/view grouping to match addresses or search strings with geographic locations. How the geographic locations generated are used or displayed is decided by any Views attached to the GeocodeModel (for example a MapItemView or ListView).
trans-unit.target: 所述GeocodeModel类型被用作模型/视图分组以匹配地址或搜索与地理位置串的一部分。生成或使用的地理位置的使用方式由附加到GeocodeModel的任何视图（例如MapItemView或ListView）决定。

trans-unit.source: The GeocodeModel type provides support for searching operations related to geographic information. More...
trans-unit.target: 该GeocodeModel类型提供了搜索与地理信息有关操作的支持。更多...

trans-unit.source: The limit and offset results can be used together to implement paging.
trans-unit.target: 该限制和偏移结果可以一起使用，以实现分页。

trans-unit.source: The Icon.icon property is used to provide an interface between C++ and QML code. First a pointer to a Icon object must be obtained from C++, then use the property() and setProperty() functions to get and set the icon property. The following gets the QPlaceIcon representing this object from C++:
trans-unit.target: 所述Icon.icon属性用于提供C ++和QML代码之间的接口。首先必须从C ++获得指向Icon对象的指针，然后使用property（）和setProperty（）函数获取并设置 icon 属性。下面从C ++ 获取表示此对象的QPlaceIcon：

trans-unit.source: The ImageModel is a read-only model used to fetch images related to a Place. Binding a Place via ImageModel::place initiates an initial fetch of images. The model performs fetches incrementally and is intended to be used in conjunction with a View such as a ListView. When the View reaches the last of the images currently in the model, a fetch is performed to retrieve more if they are available. The View is automatically updated as the images are received. The number of images which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of images available can be accessed via the totalCount property.
trans-unit.target: 该ImageModel是用来取得相关的图像只读模式广场。通过ImageModel :: place绑定Place会初始化图像的初始获取。该模型以增量方式执行访存，旨在与诸如ListView的View结合使用。当“视图”到达模型中当前的最后一个图像时，将进行提取以检索更多（如果有）的图像。接收到图像后，视图将自动更新。一次获取的图像数量由batchSize属性指定。可以通过totalCount属性访问可用图像的总数。

trans-unit.source: The ImageModel type provides a model of place images. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述ImageModel类型提供场所的图像的模型。更多...

trans-unit.source: The Map item also supports user interface interactions with the map using tactile and mouse gestures. That is features such as swiping to pan, pinching to zoom.
trans-unit.target: “ 地图”项还支持使用触觉和鼠标手势与地图进行用户界面交互。这是诸如滑动以平移，捏以缩放等功能。

trans-unit.source: The Map item using this plugin, can also be customized using MapParameters, allowing runtime changes to the map style and data.
trans-unit.target: 使用此插件的Map项，也可以使用MapParameters进行自定义，从而允许在运行时更改地图样式和数据。

trans-unit.source: The Map type allows the display of a map and placing objects within the map. Various points of interest can be defined and added to the map for display. Also the Map has features to control how the map is displayed. With the Map item you can center the map, zoom, pinch and make the item flickable.
trans-unit.target: 的地图类型允许在地图内的地图和放置对象的显示。可以定义各种兴趣点并将其添加到地图上以进行显示。另外，地图具有的特点来控制地图的显示方式。使用“地图”项，您可以将地图居中，缩放，缩小并使该项可滑动。

trans-unit.source: The MapCircle type displays a geographic circle on a Map, which consists of all points that are within a set distance from one central point. Depending on map projection, a geographic circle may not always be a perfect circle on the screen: for instance, in the Mercator projection, circles become ovoid in shape as they near the poles. To display a perfect screen circle around a point, use a MapQuickItem containing a relevant Qt Quick type instead.
trans-unit.target: 所述MapCircle类型显示在地图上，它由来自一个中央点的一组距离内的所有点的地理圆。根据地图的投影，地理圆可能并不总是屏幕上的完美圆：例如，在墨卡托投影中，圆在靠近极点时会变成卵形。要在一个点周围显示完美的屏幕圆圈，请改用包含相关Qt Quick类型的MapQuickItem。

trans-unit.source: The MapCircle type displays a geographic circle on a Map. More...
trans-unit.target: 该MapCircle类型显示在地图上的地理圈子。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapCopyrightNotice item displays the current valid copyright notice for a Map element. More...
trans-unit.target: 该MapCopyrightNotice项显示的地图元件的电流有效的版权声明。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapGestureArea type provides Map gesture interaction. More...
trans-unit.target: 该MapGestureArea类型提供地图手势交互。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapGestureArea, when enabled, must process all incoming touch events in order to track the shape and size of the "pinch". The overhead added on touch events can be considered constant time.
trans-unit.target: 该MapGestureArea，启用时，必须处理，以便跟踪的“捏”的形状和大小所有传入的触摸事件。可以将触摸事件上增加的开销视为恒定时间。

trans-unit.source: The MapItemGroup type is a container for map items. More...
trans-unit.target: 该MapItemGroup类型是地图项的容器。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapItemView is used to populate Map from a model. More...
trans-unit.target: 该MapItemView用于从一个模型填充地图。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapItemView is used to populate Map with MapItems from a model. The MapItemView type only makes sense when contained in a Map, meaning that it has no standalone presentation.
trans-unit.target: 该MapItemView用于填充地图与模型MapItems。该MapItemView包含在地图类型的时候才有意义，这意味着它没有独立的表现。

trans-unit.source: The MapParameters, used to control the style of the map at runtime, always have a type property, followed by user defined properties that try to match the Mapbox Style Specification naming as much as possible, replacing the dash with camel case for technical reasons (i.e. line-cap will be translated to lineCap).
trans-unit.target: 用于在运行时控制地图样式的MapParameters始终具有type属性，其后是用户定义的属性，这些属性尝试尽可能匹配Mapbox Style Specification的命名，出于技术原因，将破折号替换为驼峰式（例如，line-cap将转换为lineCap）。

trans-unit.source: The MapPolygon type displays a polygon on a Map, specified in terms of an ordered list of coordinates. For best appearance and results, polygons should be simple (not self-intersecting).
trans-unit.target: 该MapPolygon类型显示在地图上的多边形，在一个方面指定的有序列表坐标。为了获得最佳外观和效果，多边形应该简单（不能自相交）。

trans-unit.source: The MapPolygon type displays a polygon on a Map. More...
trans-unit.target: 该MapPolygon类型显示在地图上的多边形。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapPolyline type displays a polyline on a map, specified in terms of an ordered list of coordinates. The coordinates on the path cannot be directly changed after being added to the Polyline. Instead, copy the path into a var, modify the copy and reassign the copy back to the path.
trans-unit.target: 该MapPolyline类型显示在地图上的折线，在一个方面指定的有序列表坐标。该坐标的道路上不能被添加到折线后直接更改。而是将路径复制到var中，修改副本，然后将副本重新分配回path。

trans-unit.source: The MapPolyline type displays a polyline on a map. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述MapPolyline类型显示在地图上的折线。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapQuickItem type displays an arbitrary Qt Quick object on a Map. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述MapQuickItem型显示器上的地图的任意的Qt快速对象。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapQuickItem type is used to place an arbitrary Qt Quick object on a Map at a specified location and size. Compared to floating an item above the Map, a MapQuickItem will follow the panning (and optionally, the zooming) of the Map as if it is on the Map surface.
trans-unit.target: 所述MapQuickItem类型用于放置在地图的任意的Qt连结对象在指定的位置和大小。与在地图上方浮动项目相比，MapQuickItem将跟随地图的平移（以及可选的缩放），就好像它在地图表面上一样。

trans-unit.source: The anchorPoint property provides a way to line up the coordinate with other parts of the item than just the top-left corner, by setting a number of pixels the item will be offset by. A simple way to think about it is to note that the point given by anchorPoint on the item itself is the point that will line up with the given coordinate when displayed.
trans-unit.target: 该anchorPoint属性可排队的不仅仅是在左上角的项目的其他部分的坐标，通过设置多个像素，该项目将被抵消的。一种简单的思考方法是，注意anchorPoint在项目本身上给定的点是在显示时将与给定坐标对齐的点。

trans-unit.source: The sourceItem property contains the Qt Quick item to be drawn, which can be any kind of visible type.
trans-unit.target: 该sourceItem属性包含要绘制的Qt Quick的项目，它可以是任何类型的可见式的。

trans-unit.source: The MapRectangle type displays a rectangle on a Map. More...
trans-unit.target: 该MapRectangle类型显示在地图上的矩形。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapRectangle type displays a rectangle on a Map. Rectangles are a special case of Polygon with exactly 4 vertices and 4 "straight" edges. In this case, "straight" means that the top-left point has the same latitude as the top-right point (the top edge), and the bottom-left point has the same latitude as the bottom-right point (the bottom edge). Similarly, the points on the left side have the same longitude, and the points on the right side have the same longitude.
trans-unit.target: 该MapRectangle类型显示在地图上的矩形。矩形是Polygon的特例，它具有正好4个顶点和4个“直”边。在这种情况下，“直线”表示左上点与右上点（顶部边缘）具有相同的纬度，左下点与右下角点（底部边缘）具有相同的纬度）。同样，左侧的点具有相同的经度，右侧的点具有相同的经度。

trans-unit.source: The MapRoute type displays a Route obtained through a RouteModel or other means, on the Map as a Polyline following the path of the Route.
trans-unit.target: 在图路线型显示器路由通过获得RouteModel或其它装置的路由的路径之后，在地图上的折线。

trans-unit.source: The MapRoute type displays a Route on a Map. More...
trans-unit.target: 该图路线类型显示在地图上的路线。更多...

trans-unit.source: The MapType type holds information about a map type. More...
trans-unit.target: 该地图类型类型保存有关地图类型的信息。更多...

trans-unit.source: The Place.place property is used to provide an interface between C++ and QML code. First a pointer to a Place object must be obtained from C++, then use the property() and setProperty() functions to get and set the place property. The following gets the QPlace representing this object from C++:

trans-unit.source: The status property will change to Place.Fetching while the fetch is in progress. On success the object's properties will be updated, status will be set to Place.Ready and detailsFetched will be set to true. On error status will be set to Place.Error. The errorString() method can be used to get the details of the error.
trans-unit.target: 在获取过程中，status属性将更改为Place.Fetching。在成功的对象的属性将被更新，状态将被设置为Place.Ready和detailsFetched将被设置为true。出现错误时，状态将设置为Place.Error。该Errorstring，则（）方法可以用来获取错误的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The status property will change to Place.Removing while the save operation is in progress. On success status will be set to Place.Ready. On error status will be set to Place.Error. The errorString() method can be used to get the details of the error.
trans-unit.target: 的状态而保存操作过程中属性将变为Place.Removing。成功时，状态将设置为Place.Ready。出现错误时，状态将设置为Place.Error。该Errorstring，则（）方法可以用来获取错误的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The status property will change to Place.Saving and then to Place.Ready if the save was successful or to Place.Error if an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 该状态属性将变为Place.Saving再到Place.Ready如果保存成功或Place.Error如果发生错误。

trans-unit.source: The status property will change to Place.Saving while the save operation is in progress. On success the status will be set to Place.Ready. On error status will be set to Place.Error. The errorString() method can be used to get the details of the error.
trans-unit.target: 的状态而保存操作过程中属性将变为Place.Saving。成功后，状态将设置为Place.Ready。出现错误时，状态将设置为Place.Error。该Errorstring，则（）方法可以用来获取错误的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The PlaceAttribute type holds generic place attribute information. More...
trans-unit.target: 该PlaceAttribute型拥有通用位置属性信息。更多...

trans-unit.source: The PlaceAttribute.attribute property is used to provide an interface between C++ and QML code. First a pointer to a PlaceAttribute object must be obtained from C++, then use the property() and setProperty() functions to get and set the attribute property. The following gets the QPlaceAttribute representing this object from C++:
trans-unit.target: 所述PlaceAttribute.attribute属性用于提供C ++和QML代码之间的接口。首先必须从C ++获得指向PlaceAttribute对象的指针，然后使用property（）和setProperty（）函数获取并设置 attribute 属性。下面的代码从C ++ 获取表示该对象的QPlaceAttribute：

trans-unit.source: The PlaceSearchModel API has some limited support for paging. The nextPage() and previousPage() functions as well as the limit property can be used to access paged search results. When the limit property is set the search result page contains at most limit entries (of type place result). For example, if the backend has 5 search results in total [a,b,c,d,e], and assuming the first page is shown and limit of 3 has been set then a,b,c is returned. The nextPage() would return d,e. The nextPagesAvailable and previousPagesAvailable properties can be used to check for further pages. At the moment the API does not support the means to retrieve the total number of items available from the backed. Note that support for nextPage(), previousPage() and limit can vary according to the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 该PlaceSearchModel API具有分页一些有限的支持。的下一页（）和|上一页（）函数以及所述限制属性可以被用来访问分页的搜索结果。当极限属性设置搜索结果页面包含至多极限条目（类型为地方结果）。例如，如果后端总共有5个搜索结果[a，b，c，d，e]，并假定显示了第一页并且设置了3个限制，则返回a，b，c。在下一页（）将返回d，E。该nextPagesAvailable和previousPagesAvailable属性可用于检查其他页面。目前，该API不支持从支持者中检索可用项目总数的方法。请注意，对nextPage（），previousPage（）和limit的支持会根据plugin的不同而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: The PlaceSearchModel has a favoritesPlugin property. If the property is set, any places found during a search are checked against the favoritesPlugin to see if there is a corresponding favorite place. If so, the favorite property of the Place is set, otherwise the favorite property is remains null.
trans-unit.target: 该PlaceSearchModel有favoritesPlugin属性。如果设置了该属性，则将在收藏夹中检查在搜索过程中找到的所有地点，以查看是否存在相应的收藏地点。如果是这样，则设置Place的收藏夹属性，否则收藏夹属性保持为null。

trans-unit.source: The PlaceSearchModel listens for places that have been updated or removed from its plugin's backend. If it detects that a place has been updated and that place is currently present in the model, then it will call Place::getDetails to refresh the details. If it detects that a place has been removed, then correspondingly the place will be removed from the model if it is currently present.
trans-unit.target: 该PlaceSearchModel监听已更新或它的插件的后台删除的地方。如果它检测到某个地点已更新并且该地点当前存在于模型中，则它将调用Place :: getDetails刷新详细信息。如果检测到某个位置已被删除，则相应地该位置将从当前存在的模型中删除。

trans-unit.source: The PlaceSearchModel returns both sponsored and organic search results. Sponsored search results will have the sponsored role set to true.
trans-unit.target: 该PlaceSearchModel同时返回赞助和有机搜索结果。赞助商搜索结果会将 sponsored 角色设置为true。

trans-unit.source: The PlaceSearchSuggestionModel can be used to provide search term suggestions as the user enters their search term. The properties of this model should match that of the PlaceSearchModel, which will be used to perform the actual search query, to ensure that the search suggestion results are relevant.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入搜索词时，可以使用PlaceSearchSuggestionModel提供搜索词建议。该模型的属性应与PlaceSearchModel的属性匹配，该属性将用于执行实际的搜索查询，以确保搜索建议结果相关。

trans-unit.source: The offset and limit properties can be used to access paged suggestions. When the offset and limit properties are set the suggestions between offset and (offset + limit - 1) will be returned. Support for paging may vary from plugin to plugin.
trans-unit.target: 该偏移和极限性能，可用于访问分页的建议。设置offset和limit属性后，将返回offset和（offset + limit -1）之间的建议。对分页的支持可能因插件而异。

trans-unit.source: The PluginParameter object is used to provide a parameter of some kind to a Plugin. Typically these parameters contain details like an application token for access to a service, or a proxy server to use for network access.
trans-unit.target: 该PluginParameter对象用于提供某种到插件的参数。通常，这些参数包含详细信息，例如用于访问服务的应用程序令牌或用于网络访问的代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: The PluginParameter type describes a parameter to a Plugin. More...
trans-unit.target: 该PluginParameter类型描述一个参数一个插件。更多...

trans-unit.source: The Ratings.ratings property is used to provide an interface between C++ and QML code. First a pointer to a Ratings object must be obtained from C++, then use the property() and setProperty() functions to get and set the ratings property. The following gets the QPlaceRating representing this object from C++:
trans-unit.target: 所述Ratings.ratings属性用于提供C ++和QML代码之间的接口。首先必须从C ++获取指向Ratings对象的指针，然后使用property（）和setProperty（）函数获取并设置 ratings 属性。下面的代码从C ++获取代表该对象的QPlaceRating：

trans-unit.source: The ReviewModel is a read-only model used to fetch reviews about a Place. The model incrementally fetches. The number of reviews which are fetched at a time is specified by the batchSize property. The total number of reviews available can be accessed via the totalCount property.
trans-unit.target: 该ReviewModel是用来取得有关评论只读模式广场。模型以增量方式获取。一次获取的评论数由batchSize属性指定。可以通过totalCount属性访问可用的评论总数。

trans-unit.source: The RouteLeg type represents a leg of a Route, that is the portion of a route between one waypoint and the next. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述RouteLeg类型表示路由，即一个航点与下一个之间的路径的所述部分的一个腿部。更多...

trans-unit.source: The RouteManeuver type represents the information relevant to the point at which two RouteSegments meet. More...
trans-unit.target: 该RouteManeuver类型表示有关的两个RouteSegments满足点的信息。更多...

trans-unit.source: The RouteModel type is used as part of a model/view grouping to retrieve geographic routes from a backend provider. Routes include data about driving directions between two points, walking directions with multiple waypoints, and various other similar concepts. It functions much like other Model types in QML (see for example ListModel), and interacts with views such as MapItemView, and ListView.
trans-unit.target: 所述RouteModel类型被用作模型/视图分组检索从后端提供商地理路线的一部分。路线包括有关两点之间的行车路线，具有多个航路点的步行路线以及各种其他类似概念的数据。它的功能与QML中的其他Model类型非常相似（例如参见ListModel），并与诸如MapItemView和ListView之类的视图进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The RouteModel type provides access to routes. More...
trans-unit.target: 该RouteModel类型提供访问路径。更多...

trans-unit.source: The RouteQuery type is used to provide query parameters to a RouteModel. More...
trans-unit.target: 的路由查询类型用于提供查询参数到RouteModel。更多...

trans-unit.source: The RouteSegment type represents a segment of a Route. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述RouteSegment类型表示的路径的线段。更多...

trans-unit.source: The Supplier.supplier property is used to provide an interface between C++ and QML code. First a pointer to a Supplier object must be obtained from C++, then use the property() and setProperty() functions to get and set the supplier property. The following gets the QPlaceSupplier representing this object from C++:

trans-unit.source: The VideoOutput item works with backends that support either QVideoRendererControl or QVideoWindowControl. If the backend only supports QVideoWindowControl, the video is rendered onto an overlay window that is layered on top of the QtQuick window. Due to the nature of the video overlays, certain features are not available for these kind of backends:

trans-unit.source: The NdefFilter type is used with the NearField type to read NDEF messages from NFC Forum tags that match a given structure.
trans-unit.target: 该NdefFilter类型可使用的近场类型来读取匹配给定结构NFC论坛标签NDEF消息。

trans-unit.source: The NdefMimeRecord type can contain data with an associated MIME type. The data is accessible from the uri in the uri property.
trans-unit.target: 所述NdefMimeRecord类型可以包含具有相关联的MIME类型的数据。可从uri属性中的uri访问数据。

trans-unit.source: The NdefRecord type is the base type for all NDEF record types in QML. It contains a single property holding the type of record.
trans-unit.target: 该NdefRecord类型是在QML所有NDEF记录的基本类型。它包含一个保存记录类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: The NdefRecord type represents a record in an NDEF message. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述NdefRecord类型表示在NDEF消息的记录。更多...

trans-unit.source: The NdefTextRecord type contains a localized piece of text that can be display to the user. An NDEF message may contain many text records for different locales, it is up to the application to select the most appropriate one to display to the user. The localeMatch property can be used to determine if the text record has been matched.
trans-unit.target: 所述NdefTextRecord类型包含文本，可以是向用户显示的局部块。NDEF消息可能包含许多针对不同语言环境的文本记录，由应用程序选择最合适的文本记录显示给用户。该localeMatch属性可以用来确定文本记录已经匹配。

trans-unit.source: The NdefUriRecord type can contain a uniform resource identifier.
trans-unit.target: 所述NdefUriRecord类型可以包含统一资源标识符。

trans-unit.source: The NearField type can be used to read NDEF messages from NFC Forum tags. Set the filter and orderMatch properties to match the required NDEF messages. Once an NDEF message is successfully read from a tag the messageRecords property is updated.
trans-unit.target: 在近场类型可以用来读取NFC论坛标签NDEF消息。设置filter和orderMatch属性以匹配所需的NDEF消息。从标签成功读取NDEF消息后，messageRecords属性将更新。

trans-unit.source: The PositionSource type provides information about the user device's current position. The position is available as a Position type, which contains all the standard parameters typically available from GPS and other similar systems, including longitude, latitude, speed and accuracy details.
trans-unit.target: 所述PositionSource类型提供关于用户设备的当前位置信息。该位置可以作为“ 位置”类型使用，其中包含GPS和其他类似系统通常可用的所有标准参数，包括经度，纬度，速度和精度详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The PositionSource type provides the developer with control, within the limits allowed by the platform, of the source of the geographical data. Apart from tradtional sources such as GPS and cell data the positional data can be sourced from a logfile which is in NMEA format.
trans-unit.target: 所述PositionSource型提供了与控制显影剂，内部的限制由平台允许的地理数据的来源的，。除了传统来源（如GPS和小区数据）外，位置数据还可以从NMEA格式的日志文件中获取。

trans-unit.source: The PositionSource type provides the device's current position. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述PositionSource类型提供该设备的当前位置。更多...

trans-unit.source: The updateInterval property can then be used to indicate how often your application wishes to receive position updates. The start(), stop() and update() methods can be used to control the operation of the PositionSource, as well as the active property, which when set is equivalent to calling start() or stop().

trans-unit.source: The coordinates on the path cannot be directly changed after being added to the Polygon. Instead, copy the path into a var, modify the copy and reassign the copy back to the path.

trans-unit.source: The monthName(), standaloneMonthName(), dayName() and standaloneDayName() can use the following enumeration values to specify the formatting of the string representation for a Date object.

trans-unit.source: The DelegateModel type encapsulates a model and the delegate that will be instantiated for items in the model.
trans-unit.target: 该DelegateModel类型封装了一个模型，将被实例化在模型项目的委托。

trans-unit.source: The DelegateModelGroup type provides a means to address the model data of a DelegateModel's delegate items, as well as sort and filter these delegate items.
trans-unit.target: 所述DelegateModelGroup类型提供解决的模型数据的手段DelegateModel的委托项目，以及排序和过滤这些委托的项目。

trans-unit.source: The ListModel element in QtQuick 2 is much more performant than in QtQuick 1. The performance improvements mainly come from assumptions about the type of roles within each element in a given model - if the type doesn't change, the caching performance improves dramatically. If the type can change dynamically from element to element, this optimization becomes impossible, and the performance of the model will be an order of magnitude worse.
trans-unit.target: QtQuick 2中的ListModel元素比QtQuick 1中的性能要好得多。性能提高主要来自对给定模型中每个元素内角色类型的假设-如果类型不变，则缓存性能将大大提高。如果类型可以在元素之间动态变化，则此优化将变得不可能，并且模型的性能将降低一个数量级。

trans-unit.source: The ListModel element in QtQuick 2 is much more performant than in QtQuick 1. The performance improvements mainly come from assumptions about the type of roles within each element in a given model - if the type doesn't change, the caching performance improves dramatically. If the type can change dynamically from element to element, this optimization becomes impossible, and the performance of the model will be an order of magnitude worse.

If the type can change dynamically from element to element, this optimization becomes impossible, and the performance of the model will be an order of magnitude worse.

trans-unit.source: The ListModel is a simple container of ListElement definitions, each containing data roles. The contents can be defined dynamically, or explicitly in QML.
trans-unit.target: 所述的ListModel是一个简单的容器ListElement定义，每个包含数据的作用。内容可以动态定义，也可以在QML中明确定义。

trans-unit.source: The Qt object: This object is specific to QML, and provides helper methods and properties specific to the QML environment.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt的对象：此对象是特定于QML，并提供辅助的方法和属性特定于QML环境。

trans-unit.source: The Qt global object provides useful enums and functions for various QML types.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt的全局对象提供不同类型的QML有用枚举和功能。

trans-unit.source: The Qt global object provides useful functions for manipulating values of basic types.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt的全局对象提供有用的功能，用于操作基本类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The Qt.application.layoutDirection property can be used to query the active layout direction of the application. It is based on QGuiApplication::layoutDirection(), which most commonly determines the layout direction from the active language translation file.
trans-unit.target: 所述Qt.application.layoutDirection属性可用于查询应用程序的活动布局方向。它基于QGuiApplication :: layoutDirection（），它通常根据活动语言翻译文件来确定布局方向。

trans-unit.source: The Qt.include() function includes one JavaScript file from another without using ECMAScript modules and without qualifying the import. It makes all functions and variables from the other file available in the current file's namespace, but ignores all pragmas and imports defined in that file. This is not a good idea as a function call should never modify the caller's context.
trans-unit.target: 所述Qt.include（）函数包括从另一个JavaScript文件而不使用ECMAScript模块和，而不必限定进口。它使另一个文件中的所有函数和变量在当前文件的名称空间中可用，但忽略该文件中定义的所有杂用和导入。这不是一个好主意，因为函数调用永远不要修改调用者的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The Qt.locale() function returns a JS Locale object representing the locale with the specified name, which has the format "language[_territory][.codeset][@modifier]" or "C".
trans-unit.target: 所述Qt.locale（）函数返回表示具有指定名称，它具有的格式的区域设置一个JS Locale对象“语言[_territory] [。代码集] [@改性剂]”或“C”。

trans-unit.source: The QtObject type is a non-visual element which contains only the objectName property.
trans-unit.target: 所述QtObject类型是仅包含一个非视觉元素对象名属性。

trans-unit.source: The HistoryState type provides a means of returning to a previously active substate. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述HistoryState类型提供返回到先前活动的子状态的手段。更多...

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractState type is the base type of States of a StateMachine. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述QAbstractState类型是各国的基本类型的StateMachine。更多...

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractTransition type is the abstract base type of transitions between states (QAbstractState objects) of a StateMachine. QAbstractTransition is part of The Declarative State Machine Framework.
trans-unit.target: 所述QAbstractTransition类型是状态之间的转变的抽象基本类型（QAbstractState对象）的一个的StateMachine。QAbstractTransition是声明式状态机框架的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractTransition type is the base type of transitions between QAbstractState objects. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述QAbstractTransition类型是间的转换的基本类型QAbstractState对象。更多...

trans-unit.source: The triggered() signal is emitted when the transition has been triggered.
trans-unit.target: 触发转换后，将触发Triggered（）信号。

trans-unit.source: The QSignalTransition type provides a transition based on a Qt signal. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述QSignalTransition类型提供了一种基于一个Qt信号的转变。更多...

trans-unit.source: The SignalTransition type provides a transition based on a Qt signal. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述SignalTransition类型提供了一种基于一个Qt信号的转变。更多...

trans-unit.source: The childMode property determines how child states are treated. For non-parallel state groups, the initialState property must be used to set the initial state. The child states are mutually exclusive states, and the state machine needs to know which child state to enter when the parent state is the target of a transition.
trans-unit.target: 该childMode属性决定孩子状态如何对待。对于非并行状态组，必须使用initialState属性设置初始状态。子状态是互斥状态，并且当父状态是转换的目标时，状态机需要知道要输入哪个子状态。

trans-unit.source: The errorState sets the state's error state. The error state is the state that the state machine will transition to if an error is detected when attempting to enter the state (e.g. because no initial state has been set).
trans-unit.target: 该errorState设置状态的错误状态。错误状态是在尝试进入状态时检测到错误的状态机将转换到的状态（例如，因为尚未设置初始状态）。

trans-unit.source: The TimeoutTransition type provides a transition based on a timer. More...
trans-unit.target: 所述TimeoutTransition类型提供基于定时器的过渡。更多...

trans-unit.source: The WorkerScript QML type lets JavaScript code run in parallel with the GUI thread.
trans-unit.target: 所述WorkerScript QML类型让与GUI线程并行运行JavaScript代码。

trans-unit.target: 所述WorkerScript QML类型让与GUI线程并行运行JavaScript代码。

trans-unit.source: The role is set to Button to indicate the type of control. name is the most important information and bound to the text on the button. The name is a short and consise description of the control and should reflect the visual label. In this case it is not clear what the button does with the name only, so description contains an explanation. There is also a signal handler Accessible.pressAction which can be invoked by assistive tools to trigger the button. This signal handler needs to have the same effect as tapping or clicking the button would have.
trans-unit.target: 该角色设置为 Button 以指示控件的类型。名称是最重要的信息，并绑定到按钮上的文本。名称是控件的简短描述，应反映视觉标签。在这种情况下，不清楚按钮仅使用名称做什么，因此说明中包含说明。还有一个信号处理程序Accessible.pressAction，可以由辅助工具调用以触发按钮。该信号处理程序需要具有与点击或单击按钮相同的效果。

trans-unit.target: 所述CanvasPixelArray对象表示高×宽×4的整数其中w和h来自CanvasImageData。CanvasPixelArray对象的length属性必须返回此h×w×4数字值。该属性是只读的。
